values: I feel like i have been.  I am constantly thinking about the things that aren't right in my life.  there are plenty.  There are many things that are going well for me.  I am enjoying osme weight loss, less stress at work, and i just made it through a decent break up.  Stupid but true.  the other thing that is true is that i am lonely.  sooooooooooooooo lonely.  I don't like being alone, makes me remember how much i am missing out on.  Am i missing out on anything really? probably not.  but i feel like i am.  I have been doing a lot lately, but i need to stop crushing on people.  there has to be more to it than this.  I am losing it.  I wish i was stronger. how do i get stronger?

Free, that is what ia m right now and i will tell you what, that is the most happy a man can get.

I have really stepped up my life.  Noting what i want to change and doing just that, losing weight, getting healthy, using the heater, i am just really dedicated to making myself better. tonight was great.  I danced like crazy and i had fun.  I didn't get intoxicated either.  I am really learning to let myself breathe and be.  It says a lot when you can allow yourself to be.

mmmmmmmmmmmm, i will sleep well.

so i have officially moved out of my old place, it was tough but it was what it was.  next chapter.  I have been thinking alot and the more i think abotu it the less i want to be in this city.  I do not enjoy living here and only pretty bad things have come of me living her.  We shall see what happens next but for now, i forge on into a new day and a new life.  and it always smells like curry in this piece.  weird.

The revolution is here.  I cnat fucking believe its over, time to go, time to move on. So much heartbreak, and pain.. So much thinking of what could have happened differently, so much wonder and concern about what is to come.  No happiness

This has become my life these last couple of months, it has only intensified and gotten more concerning.  I know that this is tough for all parties involved but i dont enjoy it, i cant stand it, and i am ready to end everything that is hurting me.  i know these posts are almost always emo but after so long, so much trying, so much angst, so much failure, you cant help but feel what you feel.  and what i feel right now is the worst paine ver.  

Its not like a breakup from high school where you wash your hands of it, this one is different, having to find all of the things you used to do together throughout your living space, pictures, cards, love letters, it really is a painful bleed you must endure to move forward.. I have been a wreck for the laste 2 weeks and i know that i cant change anything.. I cant do shit to fix anything, everything is done, i must accept that which i do not want to accept and there is no other option. no one cares what you want you have to deal with it.  and you have to accept it.  I dont know if i can do that. i cant do that.

So its been about a month and a half and i cant adapt.  I could if i wanted to but i dotn want to.  It hurts to know that we are both hurting and hurts more that you dont hate me.

Its tough to say but i wish we werent freinds, this would be much easier.  Thats not to day i dont want to be your freind, just that it makes things so difficult.  I always knew we would be freinds, i watned so badly to be your everything and your only thing, the unfortunate reality is that that was never going to work.  I thought there were things that may cause little problems, not big ones.  These are big ones and i know that our reconciliation wont be possible for a very long time.  WHY!

I cant stop thinking about yuo.  I just think and think and think.  We have enjoyed the last couple of weeks so much more than the last two years of our time together.  WTF that is not how things should be.  That is nto the way people function.  I am starting to realize though that we are not normal people.  we have our differences from everyone else and we are suffering because of who we have chozen to be.  

If it is so easy, why cant we choose to be the people who will be happy.  why is it so impossible?  I have so much pain inside and i long for your company.  This is not how my life was supposed to play out.  I know everyone thinks you moved here to be with me and that may be true but what people don't think about is why i moved here.  I moved because i wanted to be able to support a family.  I knew i needed a job to do that and it wasn't working in GA.  I made the move to be with you as well.  I thought i knew what i needed to do.  I feel so guilty cause of how we ended up, i cant let it go.  I cant stop smoking, i cant stop eating, i cant motivate myself to get up and go out and be the person i know i can be.  I cant, i am so defeated.  I wonder how long it will take to get on the positive side again.  Will i ever be there?

Im sitting here with my late night snack.  Trying to think of what is going on in my life

first, I got out of the hospital a year ago. I had no lung capacity at all and i was in desperate need of constant help.  I am glad to be out but i have a huge part of me that wants to go back.  being in the hospital was one of the scariest and most exciting things i have ever had happen to me.  Is that weird or what?

second, i am selfish in my needs.  I cant force myself to be the good caring person i once was.  I look around and wonder what i will do with myself and how is it that people cannot realize my needs?  i dont know what has gotten into me but i dont like it.  I miss my innocent times.

I have lost a sense of caring about others that i once had.  i dont knwo that i truly lost it so much as it has just never been returned to so i have exhausted all that i have had.  I dont wnat to make any rash decisions but how much longer must i put my needs on hold? where do i find the patience to wait on others vs the balls to say fuck it and move on.  

Im just tired.  just plain fucking tired and i dont get to relieve any stress.  When a normal man comes home, he gets some kind of relief.  I dotn.  i just get more fucking stress and i am sick of it.  I cant do all of your work for you.  You have to get off of your ass and do something for yourself.   and that wont change.  There is a big difference between support and doing everything you want and need.  I will support you but i cant live your life for you and fix your problems for you.  its time to be a woman about things and figure it out.  if you dont want to get off of your ass to do so thats cool too but dont be surprised with the reprecussions becasue i am reaching a boiling point.  My patience ends and thats it, cut scene, its a wrap.  I dont get them back.  I have been fair to you and done all tha ti can.  I can no longer do for you.  I deserve something to be done for me.  Either return the things that i have done and show me some love or i gotta go.  Decision is so simple and so painfully hard but this decision must be made.  and Its not mine to make....

I am lost in the world right now. I don't really understand what is going on in my life. I have never felt so sad and depressed as I do now. My negative emotions have taken over and I am just upset. I can't find my feet and I don't know how yo change my emotion. Nothing makes sense. I don't think I can last much longer like this. Today I saw grass and was uplifted. After ten seconds I went back under. In stuck in a nasty fog without an exit. Someone help me.....

Posted via LiveJournal app for Android.

I wish most days i could decipher the code in my mind.  I cant seem to figure out why i am feeling the way i am feeling on most day.  I am emotional, unpredictable, and just not really all that much fun.  

What is grinding through my head is all the same cluttered bullshit it has been for months now.  first there are the thoughts of the hospital, then there is the pressure of turning into a married man, then there is the need to succeed at my job and make more money.  these things i feel like drive my life.  i got denied for the credit amount that i would need to achieve one of these things.  who knows why.  so many thing that i pride myself on spawn from failures in my life

example, I am very independent and i am a problem solver.  i think outside the box and people praise me for my ability to quickly analyze and solve even the most complicated problems.  the problem with that is that it comes from a need that has been forced into me at an age that was too early fro the maturity level that i was at.  there are more examples like that it just tends to suck after a while.

Beyond that i feel like i have grown up and turned into an old person inside.  not because i don't like to have fun but as of late it doesn't really exist for me.  I haven't made quality friends in DC but i am making progress.  people always say that i can be friends with anyone but there is a clarification that is needed.  it is easy for people to want to be friends with me and become my acquaintances but often times they are more friendly to me than i intend to return.  there is just a lot of fakeness inside me lately that i cant shake.  I don't really have desire to carry on relationships with people who i don't necessarily like.  I am just a basket case
right now i am just sitting vegging out and i cant for the life of me figure out why i am so down.  how do i get out of this funk? i fall into pretty regular and deep depressions when i am alone and i don't have a drive to do anything.  gemzer told me this had happened to him and i couldn't believe that it would ever happen.  How could a person lose their drive and need for excitement.  I feel like it has been sucked out of me.  Just when i thought i was going to be fine and get to my dreams my world was crushed and i cant recover.  I am tired of whining and being upset about being in the hospital, but i cant get over it and i want too.  I want my body to realize that none of it was significant just a hiccup but it feels like so much more.  I am always considering the past and thinking how much better off i used to be in some respects.  i cant see anything that is both current and positive in my life.  I am fading and i cant stop it.  i just feel hopeless, helpless, and sad. 

I don't know where this is headed or when it ends.

So this is important to me because it concerns all the peole i care about the most.  Me, My girl, my family.

I WROTE THAT WHEN IW AS RECENTLY OU TOF THE HOSPITAL AND NEVER FINSIHED IT.  WOW THAT SEEMS LIKE A LONG TIME AGO BUT IT WILL NEVER SEEM FAR ENOUGH AWAY IN MY MIND.   SINCE THEN I HAVE BATTLED WSITH SOME PAIN   killer addiction and a psyciatrick meltdown.

It begins with the need to stop pain.. that need eventually turns into a need to stop all the pain.  which transforms you into a person craving medication that you dont need. if i didnt have any control, i know i would have been much worse off.  thankfully i was able to stop my constant hunger to quell pain especially because it didnt exist.  that was one of the tougher things that i had to deal with since i have been out

next is most likely my familya nd how horrible they treated my girlfriend.  mind you it wasnt the entire fam but some of the key players.  just absolutely showed me they had no respect for what i cared about. i still havent gotten over that.  WHen i say i bust my ass for my family i mean just that.  would do anything they needed and have done it over and over.  i would think i was due the same courtesy  but they would think otherwise.  this is sa time where i would normally enter a to their credit kind of thing but today i am all about blame
fuck em

i have this absolutely horrible person that i work with at school and she just gets under my skin. unbelievable how rude she is and how much lip she gives me adn treats me like shit.  today i called her on it and i am happy i did but i feel bad i hurt her.  she doesnt have thick enough skin to be as mean as she is.  I just dont know. i can hadnle alot and it takes a lot to break me but once i reach that spot its a wrap.  hope you werent the one who made me upset ya know?

Everyone says i am really EMO on this thing and i think that is true becasue whenever i write in here its cause my life is generrally in the toilet. AKA right now when things are kind of rough.  ill get through but i will have alot of issues.  i hope god is there to help me cope....

this is a road i ddint see myslef going down anytime soon but here i am.  trying to regain the strength that i have lost.  trying to figure out just what made my life the one that needded to go through such a major experience.  I guess i am angry at times abotu parts of itlike the fact that my summer has been ruined as far as what i woul.d have liked to expereince.  I dont know, i just am glad to be out of the hospital and to have such great people around me.  my family, my grilfriend, my friends that have called in with support.  it is just a very good thing to know.  

I find myself sad some days though.  i feel like i am missing out on so much that i wanted to do.  Oh well. more to come later i suppose.

THe PAin is unbearable.  I cant stand it anymore.  am i dying? i dont know what ot think anymore.  this is the fourth night that this shit has woken me up.  please let me know when i will be able to be rid of this shit.  Today i am going to the doctor. exactly 12 hours from now.  i can barely wait to go i want to head there now but that isnt an option.  Jesus this sucks.  ok ill stop bitching now its just interfering wtih my life.

In other news i am excited to head back to atl azfter the cruise.  i get to see my peeps and my girlfriend.  then my girlfriend is going to head back with me and i am extremely excited about it.  the worst feeling is being unable to care for those that you love.  i am tired of that feeling and i aim to change it.

Marinate on that one for a minute
FUCK>  this is super stressful. fuck fuck fuck fuck
I have got it.  turkey hotdogs and broccoli.  IT tastes like dirt b ut it served its purpose.  i hope i can get this done2 354
out of control.  everything is compounding right now.  i cant handle it and i am getting mroe and more frustrated by the second.  please someone help me.

Crying, Pissing, and moaning.  i listen to it everyday.  you would think that if someone had a problem they would bring it up, get advice and try and implement it.  not continue to complain blindly.  you would think.  i think its fucked up what happened.  how could you disrespect me as if you werent related to me.  i will never think of you the same and that is not something i would say without truly meaning it.  I would never have treated you like that.  your word and your feelings are a good enough basis for me to help you out but i guess yoru fucking high horse prevents you from doing the same for anyone else.  grow the fuck up and shut the fuck up you arent nice and you dont deserve to be treated as well as you think you do

in other news...

I miss my peeps.  It was good to see them when i came down the last time but i wish it was a daily thing like it used to be.  I hope that the things i want i am able to accomplish.  life is a struggle that i am winning and losing all at the same time.  lets hope i can continue on in a positive light.

and a sidenote...

first game of slowpitch tomorrow finally i am getting involved in something that i am interested in up here.  excited because this weekend i think i will go out and see lil bro.  good times. this just might work

the experience has been new.  and it has taught me that i know a great deal less than i thought i did.  it is interesting to experience going from a place where the people really knew me and thought i was good, almost looked up to me ina  sense.  for some of course others not so much.  but really appreciated me to a place where no one cares.  IT humbles you, makes you realize that there is so much to this world that we have yet to discover.  i dont wnat to get stuck in any one place.  i have alot of things that iw ould like to do.  such as enjoy every moment i have on earth.  there is so much to see and so much to do that i hae finally come to realize, i am a sheltered individual

My plans for the future will alow me to change that.  i will no longer be afraid of what i dont understand.  the future holds much improvement for my life.  it will be a good one lots of stuff is happeneing here soon.  my beloved gf is plannign on moving here and i hope she does.  i truly enjoy her company and i think our lives togehter will be great.  zee is coming now all i need are jacob and krista.  not in that order of course.  this life may not be fun most of the time but it is the only one that i have so i am going to live it up the best i can. people holler at me and comment and shit.

I live far. away.  I miss my friends.  i am now officially socially awkward.  i dont knwo what to say or when to say something and i havent gotten them sea legs.  the adventure to this new place is interesting but jesus christ i cant take much more of living with a sibling.  beyond my dreams for freedom, i have a dream to have a comfortable life.  even though i make money, i cant afford to live on my own.  shitty right?  the good news is that my job is enjoyable.  at this very momemnt i am overseeing a student who is going back to check answers on a test.  Teaching is very fun and easy.  I never thought i would be a teacher ever, i always hated them when i was younger but now its kind of fun.  as for my life outside of school there really isnt one.  i go home and sleep or chill mostly and i guess it bothers me.  i have to figure out where my life is meant to go but right now i just have to enjoy it.  there is nothing that serious that should be keeping me from enjoyment.  i wish people were still on here.  you fuckers are lame.
holla

yeah i wonder what i am doing.   what have i really done wrong.  when will i relize what i can fix and what i should leave alone.  i am tired and wish my life were different.  i am grateful for many things but very sad abotu many others.  life with no trace of purpose is no life at all.  i hate this feeling.  like you have wronged somoen but you dont really understand how.   you are apologizing just to make the situation better but you feel wronged. I want to say that i am done with that kind of thinking but i just dont know that i am. someone help me.

I know that no one reads these things anymore adn that is fine.  I just want to should out to people back in GA and let yall knwo that its different up here.  money to be made but i miss the peopel that i had come to knwo very well . this week was filled witha lot of sorrow and a lot of happiness.  sorry that so much sadness came from em moving but happy that so much good could come as well.  I really wasnt thinking about the seperation the beggening of this weekk but it got kind of bad on wednesday.  now i am homesick . not much fro me to do and its kind of scary.  at any rate, i wanted to let you guys knwo that i will be up here for a while cause the job is easy and i enjoy it.  anyhoodle ia m going to try and update twice a week.  stay close.

lately, there has been so much shit going on in my life that i dont even know where i stand on any issue.  i am losing my fucking mind.  i cant decide what i should or should not listen to or what i should or should not think, there is no way that i can continue on like this and no reason i should be in this situation.  how can you know what the right think to think is when you cant even decide what you are thinking.

Reading doesnt give you the genius you need for everyday situations.  sometimes you ahve to go out and experience it yourself before you begin to understand exactly what it is that you want.  for me, i have seemed to try and fix situations that have made my life extrememly complicated.  i have been through alot of different things that have shaped me and i dont think that i want to be in pain.  i am however in plenty of pain.  i lack the abilityy to clear my own head and decipher my own code.  this has begun to make me question my exisitence.  i wish there was a way to know.

i have to say taht i usually enjoy new experiences.  but sometimes those experiences are horrible just awful and they will follow you around. i was of the impression that they would follow me around forever and that is something that is really depressing.  forever is a very long time.  why would i let something that i chose at one point follow me forever? yeah i couldnt figure it out either.  i have lost many nights of sleeep over this one, i have shed more tears about it than i did for the five yars prior and i can honestly say it split me clear down the middle.  you never thought that as a decent guy you would make a decision that you wouldn't completely agree with.  doing what is best for yoruself is a decision that is never easy and is not always a 100 percent of the time kind of thing.

i can say that i never gave up the fight and didnt ever want to but i will also say that this fight will not end with complete blame on anyone.  it is shared very much among all parties involved.  i wont ever stop caring so thats not an option.  i believe that no one will but maybe it will take more time before the situation pans out completely.

i know you are reading this and i just want to say i hope you are well.  i dont want you to think i hate you or anything like that.  just in case we never are freinds again i hope you have a great life.  you were a great friend to me and i will never forget that.  it has been a year since we have been freinds and i was reading my posts from that time and i think it is really crazy how everything happened.  again i hope you are well

this is where i am now
phill

that is the best description of how i feel most of the time.  many things on my brain and many things that i cant figure out.  when will i change, where will i end up, how will i get myself under contorl? all of these questions that i cant find the answers too and what bothers me more is if i will ever find the answers. sometimes i wonder if holding back my emotions and feelings is in someway lying to myself.  i know that i am preventing unneccessary drama but should i just express what i feel?
no matter how hard i try, everyone loses

This is a year for me unlike any other.  why you ask? because its 2009 fuckface and that has never happened before.  other than that its just 365 days for me to run around trying to figure out the meaning of life.  maybe there isnt one and maybe there is but i will try to find it.  

Reflection:
2008 saw some major ups and downs.  mostly downs.  i was robbed of a good friend.  the reason why is selfishness, who was selfish? not I.  i am the most likely to try and make things right amongst people i know especially ones that i care about and that are close to me.  for this year however, i will say goodbye to you and though it truly breaks my heart, you have shown me that that is what you would like.  so long dear friend, you will be missed.

i lost my drive to succeed inlife, then i got it back.

i got to spend a wonderful amount of time with my fantastic girlfriend

i lack only from withina nd i know that now so i am addressing it

i could nto come to grips with irrational thinking people though i wanted them in my life.  what kidn fo sense does that make.

for the upcoming year however there will be significant change

this is not the way i imagined things would be at this time.  there are tons and tons of things i would habve liked ot have done differently along the wahy.  decisions that i would have liked to say i hadnt made and ones that i would also like to take credit for.  what is throughly depressing still is the lack of udnerstanding that i have abotu decision making.  i wish all of the time that i could go back and change the things that i have alreayd done.  if only there was some way that i could makie my life into what iwant versus what it has to be i think that i would be slightly happier.  truth of it all is that even if i was able to go back and changwe waht i have done, there is no way that i would be prepared for some of the things that i would have envountered along the way anyway.  decisions eacha dn every one of them is a catch 22.  it may seem like it is righ at the time but you can alwasy look back on them and realize that there was another way you could have gone and you undoubtedly would have acheived a different outcome.

TRICK IS
you cant chang what yyou have done and it is going to be whatever it is.  so you must accept it.  i need to take my own advice and i need to do it now.

there was fuckin up

there are those times you just sit and ponder the future.  what will happen to all of the positive times that you knew and love.  will there ever be a time in the future where you feel those same feelings or are there only new ones to be felt.  i have been thinking about this a lot lately and i feel like i am realizing that the way that i felt in the past or the way i feel now may be a part of something i will never tap into again.  i don't know if anyone else has these  same feelings but i mean think about it.  you know the feeling you get when you have an obsession and then the thing that you wanted so badly comes to you and it is yours.  that feeling of being obsessed with it will never come back to you.  i guess the point is that the way we feel now wont be the same in the future.  things that we know and love we may still know and love but it will never be the way that we are experiencing it now.  we don't get to go back and though we know this we still make some of the dumbest fucking mistakes without stopping to think twice about what we are doing.  i guess the fact that things are destined to keep moving forward gives us an excuse to act like idiots.  we cant all be perfect


i am not

its what we do for fun.  we attempt to pretend we are in complete control of everythign around us.  like it is everyone else who is having the problems but the fact of this matter is that we are losing our minds.  we go throughy and on in our shitty lifes and we have no idea what is going on.  we pretend and it makes us completely useless to the rest of the world.  i have lost my sense of self and lost touch of what i really love.  the things that i shoudl appreciate had lost that meaning to me.  i mean all of it.  it turns out that i have been projecting my negative emotions and the things that i secretly thing are wrong wiht me onto othe r people.  i apologize not to everyone but those that know what i am talking about.  dont lose yourself, make sure your found

There is a lot in this world that people are fortunate enough to have and they often do not appreciate it until it has left them. I can say that I have been guilty of this in the past and I am making it top priority to make sure that I know just what I have. I am constantly worried that there is something that I am taking for granted and not giving earnest appreciation to. God I hope I haven't overlooked anything. Let me make sure....
1. I miss sugar. I haven't been able to freely consume that shut in so long it is redicilous.
2. I miss my easy life. Before college and diabetes I miss living without any serious maladies.
3. I miss days off from work and not have to work 90 hour weeks.
4. I miss you. You went far away only for a few days and I feel like it has been forever. I know you are coming back but I do miss you.
5. I miss you and the times we used to share many long talks to all hours of the morning. The gunshots were fun as well and I hope we can continue to be friends and build back up what we had.
6 I miss you and all that we used to talk about. The up side is that now I have you and I can still talk to you about everything. I do miss chasing you for all of those years it was fun, it had its ups and downs and there were skeptics but they were very wrong. I love you.
7. Last but now least I miss you. You and I shared so much and I miss that friendship that we had. I would have never traded that for the world and unfortunately I didn't get to make that decision. I can't go back however and that is painful.

As with many international organizations, the world bank has made it a priority to help others. With that in mind the world bank still has many different aspects to its make up that set it apart from othre IO's. With a purpose that we currently are that aims to help those countries that can no longer help themselves, the world bank also has a hidden agenda that is never brought to light.  The following is an account of what the world bank currently does and what its original purpose was. In addition we will look at what the world bank does thsyn would make it a compobst and also view the ways that our ethical theories affect those involved in the organization

what is missing form your life? you dont have everything and you know it is true.  so what is missing.  money? friends? loved ones? trust? 
Everyone is lackign in there own way. i know that the biggest thing that i lack and i lack it on a daily basis is an understandign of events.  especially the ones in my life.  if you have to do something there is no way around it but i want to be able to understand the things that i feel i have to do before i do them and often i don't.  i know we had to stop tlaking because it was no longer a progressive relationship.  but why is that the case? what happened really that made it change? when did it go sour and who could have shown us that something was wrong.  i am a firm believer that there was some way for it to have been manageable but i could be wrong.  people often say that people just grow in different directions but i dont know if that is soemthing i want to believe.  i want to have a world that makes sense to me.  i dont want to lose those thati hold close for any reason.  maybe it is a fight that i am not able to win but i am going to fight till i die.  it is no longer a question of is it possible.  it is a question of what must i do.  i am going to find this answer before it is too late.  i wish it was different for us and it still bothers me becasue i can not grasp the understaning of what really happened.  i am going to find out why though.  i hope you do too.
i hate you for trying to destroy me.

Its me mother fuckers. I am absolutely excited about the next three weeks. If I make it I will be on track to graduate next year and I will be able to enjoy two months of summer. That would be fantastic. I am ready to be done but I must pay for me mistakes before that dream can become reality. Looking back on my college career this far, I can say I don't regret anything. Not because I didn't make a ton of mistakes along the way but because I have become an awesome testimony of a truly hard life. I have been through and done a lot and this last year will be my hardest. But no matter what, my world is not over. My life goes until my heart stops and I am thankful that i'm still ticking. Life is very short and you shouldn't live it with baggage. For that reason I say thanks to everyone who got me here. I appreciate all that you have done for me. We may not still be close but I love you all.

What makes good music can be looked at differently by every person.some people think I has to do with how much the music changes or how well it was written. On a majority level I think that how the music affects us is the largest part of our enjoyment.  If I hear something and it has absolutely no effect on my mood of general demeanor, I donl,t think the music was good at all. When I went to loca Luna on Monday, there was a great charge in the air around the band. They were highly anticipatted by all of the people there and just that feeling let me know it was going to be a great show. As soon as they started I was out of my seat. Moving around and dancing to the best was just as natural as breathing. I noticed quite an array of instruments as wwll. The guitars were there just like in any other band but was really amazing was the appearance of two people in the percussion section. Not only was there someone on a drum set but there was also a person who was strictly on the percussion section. Just like Raphael showed us in class, the percussionist changed his instruments between each song. What was absolutely amazing about the experience was how everyone just juved with one another. There was absolute congruency all around and people who were in attendance could feel this. Even there it wasn't like a packed out night, everyone who was there was having a great time. I am very glad I had the chance to attend this concert

Have you ever just tried so hard to pay attention to something but It wsa just to boring? That is what I am doing right now I can't tell you how hard it is for me to focus on this boring ass class. People just getting up and leaving and I am sitting here so hungry and so tired that I can barely post this. The kid next to me just started snoring. Man life is weird.

       In other news I feel like there are people out there who lack the maturity level that they need to lead their lives. Not being nice to those that are nice to you creates a bad sense of feeling and will cost you later on in life. I feel lie a cause of this often comes from not getting the discipline needed when you are brought into this world.  I am not saying its horrible parenting but rather some of the stresses that we acquire as life goes forward. One of the largest and most devastating occurances, is divorce. When divorce comes into play, the children lose. The parents stop parenting and go into panic which allows a child to get freedom to early. I got it and lost control but I was old enough to catch myself. Though I did I feel like I still am out of control. I have a sense to do whatever the duck I want and though I am old enough, I still lack a sense of responsibility. I will find it and I will survive. I hope the same happens for everyone who needs it.

This time is the last shot. the time that counts.  it is in the times like this that we are put into a position where we are required to do our best. i am put here for several reasons.  to make sure that those that i care about more than anything else are taken care of and healthy.  to make sure that they will alwasy be protected from the negative aspects around them.  i find that there is a spiral that i am involved in to make sure that this task is accomplished and in that spiral, i panic.  i lose control and dont realize what is going on around me.  all i can focus on are the important things infront of me.  making sure that what i am focused on gets done correctly and effectively.  the lack of control on everything around me however, has proven to be a real problem.  that is the problem that i aim to fix.  I realize that the only way to be incontrol of the outcome of a situation is to be in control of yourself.  hard to do but i must find a way.....

sometimes, you know what fuck sometimes, i alwasy start these with that word.  All the time i am feeling emotions.  quite often lately those have been extremely mixed.though i feel that is fine, what i dont like is that i havent been true to myself.  i give people shit when i feel like they dont give me their all becasue i feel like i do.  last night i realized something.  i only want to give those that i am really close to the good part of me.  i dont often give alot of negative emotions to people i whose opinions i value.  now i havent been false with anyone, i just havent been true to myself in being completely out there.  maybe by me caring so much for others i dont want them to suffer through my pain either.  i think that for me, it takes alot for me to open up to people and let out everything tha tis on my mind.  its gotten to the point wherei do nt even realize that i am doing it.  i dont like to talk about the negative things that are on my brain because i would rather just sit and think about them. i do realize now however, that if i do not talk about what is on my mind it will eat me alive.  please forgive me for taking so long to figure this out it really has nothing to do wiht you its just the thihngs that go through my brain dont always get completely thought through.  i am ever changing however and that shouldnt be an issue anymore.

man it feels good to know im a good person.  right now my roommate is talking computer bullshit to me and i have no idea what he is saying but its all good. i wish that the decisions that i make were instantly right or wrong but that is not the way of the world.  i must wait for the future to find out if i did the right thing.  to me however, i knwo that i did what is best for me.  I am glad that i can enjoy myself without worrying if other people think negatively of me.  its a very interesting position to be in.  When you cant show your love to everyone that you wish to, you have to continue to show it to those that will accept it.  until we get past our own ego's and learn to not cherish the sound of our own voice so much but rather listen to those around us, we will never prosper.  cut the bullshit

will make it two weeks to the day that i stopped tlaking to my best freind.  things like this are often hard but seldom necessary.  in my case there werent any other options for me so i did what i needed to do to let some steam off of my head.  it helped in ways that i can not even describe.  there are many things that we are afreid to say to the ones that we love becasue we dont want to hurt them.  i especially think this is true and i dont want to hurt anyone.  in this situation however i think i need to be true to myself and in doing that some feelings will more than likely get hurt.  its going to get worse before it gets better
when i wish that the things i wanted to say would just fall out of my mouth.  oh well i guess i am not so fortunate.

life is full of oppurtunities and copius things to do.  there are so many places that i have yet to see and certainly are places that i wont see.  i have accepted the notion that we are here for a limited time.  everything in this world is finite. your job, your car, your life, one day everything will end for everyone.  there is no stopping time.  it ticks by in a now now time signature that is oblivious to our cares and needs.  the sun rises and the sun falls.  it seems routine but one day we will wake up to the end of our world. it will be the end of our good mornings and a permanent goodnight.  sure it seems really emo and sad but it is truth not so much emotion.  
       i am not here to try and make everyone enjoy their time on this earth, i could give a fuck.  alli know is that i am going to do what i want to do that makes me happy and glad to be on the planet.  there is nothing else that you can do but give happiness an honest attempt.'  
       dont shit talk people. sure it feels good to get what you want to say off your chest but at the end of the day did you help someone with what you said or were you just bitching to hear yourself? a huge thing that i am currently learning is the beauty and neccessity of is not wasting time brooding over whats wrong instead of either fixing it or in the instance that is not possible, moving forward to find more positives.  you and i and everyone who reads this and everyone else in the world will eventually have to face the music.  its inevitable. are you doing what you want to right now? are you living for happiness or are you living to be better than others? look at what you have and cherish it.  think about what you would do if you didnt have it and whether or not that is what you really want.  
       before you react to what i am saying, i encourage you to take time to really think about what i am saying.  dont blame others until you have blamed yourself in every possible instance.  not saying you are wrong but have you acutally assessed the situation. 
      the biggest problem that everyone has is a lack of view.  we see through our own narrowed vision wihtout considering what others may see.  if you say you have you are probably lying to yourself becasue it takes a vast amount of time.  
    i currently am attempting to look from all angles at the situations within my own life.  the good the bad and the ugly, it all needs a fresh view in my eyes.  time it will take and that is exactly what i will grant it.  its much mroe important to understand my life and what i am doing than to make someone else temporarily happy. give me time and give me peace. i will do the same for you
